description: Japanese barberry (Berberis thunbergii f. atropurpurea 'Atropurpurea Nana') is a stunningly beautiful plant species that will transform any landscape. Its dark red to purple foliage and bright yellow flowers provide a unique and eye-catching contrast. It is drought and shade tolerant and an ideal choice for an attractive evergreen hedge. This low maintenance plant is also deer and rabbit resistant. Since Japanese barberry is one of the few barberry species that stay a manageable size, it is perfect for hedges, edging, and for small spaces. Its plentiful branches offer exceptional year-round interest and make a wonderful addition to any garden or landscape.
